06/17 UPDATE: Some have been asking why I keep posting these charts. My rationale is that the daily low have been following a long predictable pattern in a similar manner as T+X and Elliot waves. This tells me that the daily low can somehow be used as a metric to gauge future price movements. ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€
